pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
